title: Short-Intensive Course on Mobile-Based LMS Site Design and Accessibility Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital learning tools and understanding of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course for strengthening competencies in designing mobile-accessible LMS within BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design a clear guidance system for educational materials within an LMS site.
Learners can propose at least three optimized reading material structures for mobile environments.
Learners can operate an LMS site evaluation tool using peer review methods with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply at least two interactive elements to the LMS to promote collaborative learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
